statements: DELETE FROM Quantum_Communication_Events WHERE event_type = 'SecureKeyExchange' AND event_date = '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM Quantum_Communication_Events WHERE event_id = 1 AND event_type = 'Entanglement'
DELETE FROM Quantum_Communication_Events WHERE event_date < '2022-05-01' AND quantum_protocol = 'QKD'
DELETE FROM quantum_participants WHERE participant_id IN (SELECT participant_id FROM quantum_participants WHERE participant_role = 'scientist');
DELETE FROM quantum_partners WHERE partner_name = 'Alice' AND partner_location = 'Moon';
DELETE FROM quantum_network_devices WHERE device_name = 'Quantum Router';
DELETE FROM quantum_network_devices WHERE device_id = 5 AND participant_id = 3;
DELETE FROM quantum_devices WHERE location = 'Lab A';
